gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Rockets 138, Hornets 104
gameRecap.excerpt: Houston defeats Charlotte, 138-104. For Houston, Jalen Green led the way with a season-high 36 points, along with nine rebounds, and four assists as the rookie Cam Whitmore notched his first career double-double (career-high 24 points, 11 rebounds). Miles Bridges led the way with 21 points and seven rebounds while LaMelo Ball tallied 15 points and eight assists for Charlotte in the losing effort. Houston wins and improves to 21-23 on the season, while Charlotte moves to 10-33 with the loss.
